products.title: Canon EOS 7D Mark II DSLR Camera
products.description: Photography is one passion where enough is never enough. If you are looking to upgrade your camera and already have a set of attachments or lenses for your Canon camera, look no further. This camera body features a superb 20.2 megapixel CMOS sensor, ISO 16,000, and is powered by dual DIGIC 6 image processors. All this results in impeccable imaging quality in shooting conditions and lighting situations. The Dual Pixel CMOS AF function featured on this Canon EOS7D Mark II DSLR Camera body provides smooth and accurate focusing when shooting videos so that subjects always remain in focus even in the most dynamic scenes.

products.description: The SONY X80J 4K Ultra HD High Dynamic Range (HDR) Smart TV lets you amplify your TV watching experience with stunning visuals, immersive sound, vibrant colours, and a large screen. With TRILUMINOS PRO technology and 4K1 HDR Processor X1, it delivers lifelike picture quality with amazing colours. This smart TV comes with an Apple AirPlay feature that allows you to stream your favourite content from your iPhone or Mac to your TV. Furthermore, its Dolby Atmos feature provides you with a theatre-like experience at home with an immersive and multi-dimensional sound.

Faq.Question: What is the minimum distance required for optimum viewing of this TV?
Faq.Answer: Thanks for your query.Recommended distance for viewing a 4K TV is 1.5 times the TV vertical screen size. Viewed from this distance, individual pixels cannot be differentiated by naked eyes.
